entries.description: Illustration from The Design of Diagrams for Engineering Formulas and the Theory of Nomography – Laurence Hewes and Herbert Seward [1923] Laurence Hewes’s and Herbert Seward’s manual on the design of nomographs, published in 1923, is an unintentional masterpiece of analogue calculation aesthetics. The topologies and contours of these charts echo the systems they encapsulate. […]
entries.author: paul
entries.title: The Music of Nomography –  Laurence Hewes’s & Herbert Seward’s ‘Design of Diagrams for Engineering Formulas’ and John Cage’s scores
entries.descriptionClean:
Illustration from The Design of Diagrams for Engineering Formulas and the
   Theory of Nomography – Laurence Hewes and Herbert Seward [1923]
   Laurence Hewes’s and Herbert Seward’s manual on the design of
   nomographs, published in 1923, is an unintentional masterpiece of
   analogue calculation aesthetics. The topologies and contours of these
   charts echo the systems they encapsulate.

entries.description: Cyprea (Cowry) Shells from Thesaurus Conchyliorum – G.B Sowerby (Cyprea mappa shown in center) Remi Rorschach, one of a few dozen or so characters in George Perec’s immensely complex and ingeniously constrained masterpiece ‘Life a Users Manual’, has a series of seemingly incongruous occupations – Â first a clown and circus manager, then an international shell […]
entries.title: Cypraea mappa – The Mollusc Cartographer
entries.author: paul

   constrained masterpiece ‘Life a Users Manual’, has a series of
